title: Xbox Series X Event Soon? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.23.20
description:
Greg and Blessing talk about Phil Spencer's transparency on Twitter, the Animal Crossing financial crisis, and Greg's new workout game. 

Time Stamps - 
00:02:40 - Housekeeping
TONIGHT at 7 pm PT, we’re having the social event of the season: Grimecraft’s Kinda Funny Animal Crossing Rave! That’s right, Grimecraft will be DJing set in Animal Crossing for the Kinda Funny Best Friends. You can watch live -- and catch Greg interviewing Grimey after the show -- on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames. But even better, you can come to the concert IN Animal Crossing. Keep an eye on Kinda Funny’s Twitter Thursday afternoon, and you can find out how to visit Grimecraft’s island and get the exclusive in-game t-shirt.
Predator stream
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman,Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:40 - Alright, is this Xbox event happening or what?
00:27:10 - Have you thought about the possibility of Microsoft phasing out the Xbox One X, because it isn’t that different from Series S? - Best Friends Q:Michael Knight
00:35:12 - The Animal Crossing Financial Collapse of 2020, Ethan Gach @ Kotaku
00:43:40 - Stadia App Crosses a Million Downloads, James Batchelor @ GIB
00:48:40 -  Brooklinen
00:50:15 -  ExpressVPN
00:51:58 - Out today
01:02:04 - Squad Up: Devin(PS4) - TheLastOfDevin
01:04:54 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Greg
